name: Zootopia
summary: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

comments.comment: I didn't believe I'd love it as much as I would.
One of the best animation films that wasn't what I expected it to be.
A great movie for all ages to enjoy, I'm 21 and I found myself 10 again.

name: Wall-E
summary: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

comments.comment: Finding love in a desolate place called space.
I couldn't believe I had tears in my eyes.
WALLLLLL-EEEE

name: Up
summary: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

comments.comment: I didn't know I'd cry about the romance in here, it brough the story to life.
It brough me to places I didn't think a child's movie could.
Finding a place where you belong i na world that isn't made for you.

name: Toy Story
summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

comments.comment: To infinity and beyond!
Bring alive the child-like imaginations we all have.
You've got a friend in me.

name: The Lego Movie
summary: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.

comments.comment: Finding the special inside you
Honestly worth a watch for the awesome song.
Watched it that many times.

name: Inside Out
summary: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

comments.comment: It shows kids about mental illness better.
A good spin on a heavy topic
They should make more shows similar to this

name: Finding Nemo
summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

comments.comment: I could watch it again annd it would be like the first time.
A fun movie for the kids to enjoy
Amazing work on the animation.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
summary: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons, becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

comments.comment: What a time to be alive where they make movies like this!
ROAAR
Title says it all, folks.

name: Monsters, Inc.
summary: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

comments.comment: Showing what fears can really be and how to face them.
A cute and charming way to show how kids can see the shades at night.
The most adorable girl ever.
